name: Raise Your Own Firebird
description:
Is your life fraught with loneliness? Fear not, my friend! You have been granted your own Firebird. Pet your bird! Feed your bird! Help your bird fight powerful foes in the arena! If your bird is happy, they will lay eggs that you can sell-- use the money to buy stat-boosting items in the shop. If your bird grows powerful enough, you may even be able to take down Cyborg Stravinsky himself...

Ideal for: Tamagotchi fans, music majors, people who spent too much time in the Chao Garden in Sonic Adventure 2.

For questions, concerns, or tech support, hit me up at @EmilyEMeo on Twitter!
